title: Mission Description
content: Your first Trailblaze journey is nearing its end. At the top of these steps is the origin of it all — it is where theStellaronlay.Remove the Stellaron andBelobogwill be completely freed from the instability and fabricated peace, and the planet will welcome a new life.However, an ending is but a new beginning — yourExpresswill also return to its rails and head towards the next destination.Once you are ready, mount the steps and witness the ending to this planet and journey.
